title: Professor B. Burçak Başbuğ and Professor Virginia Murray appointed interim co-chairs of CODATA’s International Data Policy Committee
content: The CODATA Officers and Executive Committee are pleased to announce that Professor B. Burçak Başbuğ and Professor Virginia Murray have been appointed as interim co-chairs of the CODATA International Data Policy Committee (IDPC) . Burçak and Virginia are committed to advancing the work of the Data Policy in Times of Crisis (DPTC) collaboration with UNESCO, which has now reached an important stage: implementing and testing the recommendations contained in the UNESCO-CODATA Toolkit . They will also...
creator: Asha
sourceTitle: CODATA, Committee on Data of the ISC
